Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 25/08/2024

Welcome to Medisense. We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website https://medisense-demo1.netlify.app/main.html and use our services, including the AI doctor chatbot, image diagnosis tool, and sign language detection feature. By accessing or using our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information
We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you use our services, including but not limited to:

Name
Email Address
Medical Information: Information related to your health, symptoms, and conditions provided during interactions with our chatbot.
Images: Photos or images you upload for diagnosis purposes.
Sign Language Data: Data collected from sign language detection.

1.2 Automatically Collected Information
When you visit our website or use our services, we may automatically collect certain information, including:

Device Information: Information about your device, including IP address, browser type, and operating system.
Usage Data: Information about how you use our services, including the features you use, the pages you visit, and the time spent on our site.

2. How We Use Your Information
We may use the information we collect from you in the following ways:

To Provide Services: To deliver and maintain our AI doctor services, including chatbot interactions, image diagnosis, and sign language detection.
To Improve Our Services: To understand how users interact with our services and to enhance their functionality.
To Communicate with You: To send you updates, notifications, and other information related to your use of our services.
For Research and Development: To analyze data for research and development purposes, aimed at improving our AI models and healthcare solutions.
To Comply with Legal Obligations: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal processes.
3. How We Share Your Information
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following situations:

With Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you.
For Legal Reasons: We may disclose your information if required by law, or if we believe such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, or prevent fraud.
With Your Consent: We may share your information with third parties if you provide us with explicit consent to do so.

4. Data Security
We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

5. Your Choices and Rights
You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

Access and Update: You can access and update your personal information by contacting us.
Deletion: You can request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.
Opt-Out: You can opt-out of receiving communications from us at any time.

6. Third-Party Links
Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

7. Childrenâ€™s Privacy
Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information from our records.

8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website. You are encouraged to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

9. Contact Us
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:

Medisense
